title: Science Inquiry Module Utilizing Flipped Learning and Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and experimental design experience
context.additional_context: Youth science education program for office/administrative professionals. Requires advanced domain expertise. Conducted in BYOD environments with summative assessment focus

learning_goals: Learners can acquire scientific theories with over 90% comprehension through video lectures and materials provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can design and implement creative solutions to real scientific problems using a project-based learning framework.
Learners can improve project outcomes through peer evaluation and feedback processes using collaboration tools, achieving over 80% completeness in final presentations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
